item.title: File structure
item.description: Here’s an example of how you might organize these files under your main folder: /config.toml Name of site, squares color, icon, etc /static/ /themes/ /content/ _index.md Any content you want to include above the list of sections (folders immediately under /content/) about.md With layout: about in the front matter Includes any content you include in the body, followed by a list of tags and categories (+links) post/
